roadmap.title: Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master the core concepts of software testing including testing types, methodologies, and quality assurance principles.

weeks.title: Introduction to Software Testing
weeks.description: Learn what software testing is, why it matters, and the different types of testing.
practiceExercises: Identify 5 bugs in a sample web application
Categorize testing types for different scenarios
Create a glossary of testing terms

weeks.title: Software Development Life Cycle & Testing
weeks.description: Understand SDLC models and where testing fits in each phase.
practiceExercises: Map testing activities to SDLC phases
Compare Waterfall vs Agile testing approaches
Create a simple test plan outline

milestoneProject.title: Testing Fundamentals Assessment
milestoneProject.description: Create a comprehensive document explaining testing types, SDLC models, and when to apply different testing strategies. Include real-world examples.

roadmap.title: Manual Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Learn hands-on manual testing techniques including black-box and white-box testing methods.

weeks.title: Black-Box Testing Techniques
weeks.description: Master testing techniques that focus on input/output without knowing internal code.

resources.name: Black Box Testing - Software Testing Help

practiceExercises: Apply equivalence partitioning to a login form
Create boundary value test cases for age validation
Design decision table for a discount calculator

weeks.title: Exploratory & Usability Testing
weeks.description: Learn unscripted testing approaches and user experience evaluation.
practiceExercises: Conduct 30-minute exploratory testing session on a website
Evaluate a mobile app for usability issues

milestoneProject.title: Manual Testing Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Test a real web application (e.g., demo e-commerce site) using multiple techniques. Document all test cases, findings, and recommendations.

roadmap.title: Test Case Design & Documentation
roadmap.description: Master the art of writing effective test cases and maintaining test documentation.

weeks.title: Writing Effective Test Cases
weeks.description: Learn to write clear, reusable, and maintainable test cases.

resources.name: How to Write Test Cases - Guru99

practiceExercises: Write 20 test cases for a user registration feature
Create test cases with various data scenarios
Prioritize test cases based on risk

weeks.title: Test Plans & Test Reports
weeks.description: Create professional test plans and communicate results effectively.
practiceExercises: Create a test plan for a mobile banking app

milestoneProject.title: Complete Test Documentation Suite
milestoneProject.description: Create a full test documentation package including test plan, 50+ test cases, and test summary report for a chosen application.

roadmap.title: Bug Tracking & Defect Management
roadmap.description: Learn to identify, report, track, and manage software defects professionally.

weeks.title: Bug Reporting Essentials
weeks.description: Master the skill of writing clear, actionable bug reports.

resources.name: How to Write a Good Bug Report

practiceExercises: Assign severity and priority to sample bugs

weeks.title: Bug Tracking Tools
weeks.description: Get hands-on experience with popular bug tracking and project management tools.
practiceExercises: Set up a Jira project for testing
Log and track bugs through their lifecycle

milestoneProject.title: Defect Management System
milestoneProject.description: Set up a complete bug tracking workflow in Jira. Log 20+ bugs from testing a web application, track them through resolution, and create metrics dashboard.

roadmap.title: API Testing with Postman
roadmap.description: Learn to test REST APIs using Postman, including automated testing and CI/CD integration.

weeks.title: Postman Fundamentals
weeks.description: Get started with API testing using Postman.
practiceExercises: Create requests with different HTTP methods
Set up environment variables for API testing

weeks.title: Advanced API Testing
weeks.description: Write automated tests and create test collections in Postman.
practiceExercises: Create a test collection with 20+ tests

milestoneProject.title: API Test Automation Suite
milestoneProject.description: Create a comprehensive Postman collection for testing a REST API. Include 30+ automated tests, environment setup, and Newman integration.

roadmap.title: Automation Testing Basics
roadmap.description: Introduction to test automation using modern frameworks like Cypress and Selenium.

weeks.title: Introduction to Test Automation
weeks.description: Understand when and why to automate tests.
practiceExercises: Evaluate which tests to automate for a project
Calculate automation ROI for sample scenarios

weeks.title: Cypress Fundamentals
weeks.description: Learn end-to-end testing with Cypress framework.
practiceExercises: Set up Cypress in a project

weeks.title: Selenium Basics
weeks.description: Get introduced to Selenium WebDriver for cross-browser testing.
practiceExercises: Set up Selenium with your preferred language

milestoneProject.title: Automation Framework Project
milestoneProject.description: Build a test automation framework using Cypress or Selenium. Automate 20+ test cases for a web application with proper structure and reporting.

roadmap.title: Agile Testing & Best Practices
roadmap.description: Master testing in Agile environments and industry best practices.

weeks.title: Agile Testing Methodology
weeks.description: Learn how testing fits into Agile and Scrum frameworks.
practiceExercises: Create test plan for a sprint
Define acceptance criteria for user stories

weeks.title: CI/CD and DevOps for Testers
weeks.description: Understand continuous integration and testing in DevOps pipelines.
practiceExercises: Set up a simple CI pipeline with tests

milestoneProject.title: Agile QA Capstone
milestoneProject.description: Simulate a complete sprint as a QA. Create user stories with acceptance criteria, test cases, automate critical paths, and set up CI/CD with automated tests.

roadmap.title: Testing Basics
roadmap.description: Learn fundamental concepts of software testing and quality assurance.

weeks.title: What is Software Testing
weeks.description: Understand the basics of software testing and why it matters.
practiceExercises: Find 5 bugs in any website you use
Explain testing to a non-technical person

weeks.title: Testing Types & Levels
weeks.description: Learn about different testing types and when to use them.
practiceExercises: Identify which testing type applies to scenarios
Explain when to use regression testing

milestoneProject.title: Testing Concepts Summary
milestoneProject.description: Create a one-page reference guide explaining testing types, levels, and when to use each. Include examples from real applications.

roadmap.title: Manual Testing Skills
roadmap.description: Develop hands-on manual testing skills with practical techniques.

weeks.title: Test Case Writing
weeks.description: Learn to write clear and effective test cases.

resources.name: How to Write Test Cases - Guru99

practiceExercises: Write 15 test cases for a login page
Create negative test cases for form validation
Use a test case template for documentation

weeks.title: Testing Techniques
weeks.description: Apply black-box testing techniques in practice.
practiceExercises: Apply boundary value analysis to an age field

milestoneProject.title: Manual Testing Project
milestoneProject.description: Test a simple web application. Write 30+ test cases, execute them, and document results with screenshots.

roadmap.title: Bug Reporting
roadmap.description: Master the art of finding and reporting bugs effectively.

weeks.title: Writing Bug Reports
weeks.description: Learn to write professional bug reports that developers can act on.

resources.name: How to Write Bug Reports - Guru99

practiceExercises: Write 10 bug reports for found issues

weeks.title: Bug Tracking Tools
weeks.description: Get hands-on with industry-standard bug tracking tools.
practiceExercises: Create a Jira account and project

milestoneProject.title: Bug Tracking Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Find and report 20 bugs from testing various websites. Use Jira to track them and create a summary report.

roadmap.title: Basic API Testing
roadmap.description: Introduction to testing APIs using Postman.

weeks.title: API Testing Introduction
weeks.description: Understand what APIs are and how to test them.
practiceExercises: Make GET requests to a public API

weeks.title: Postman Basics
weeks.description: Learn to use Postman for API testing.
practiceExercises: Test CRUD operations on a sample API

milestoneProject.title: API Testing Collection
milestoneProject.description: Create a Postman collection to test a public REST API. Include tests for all CRUD operations with basic assertions.

roadmap.title: Mobile Testing Basics
roadmap.description: Learn fundamentals of testing mobile applications.

weeks.title: Mobile Testing Fundamentals
weeks.description: Understand unique aspects of mobile app testing.
practiceExercises: Test a mobile app on different devices

milestoneProject.title: Mobile App Test Plan
milestoneProject.description: Create a test plan for a mobile application. Include device matrix, test cases for mobile-specific scenarios, and testing checklist.

roadmap.title: Test Documentation
roadmap.description: Create professional test documentation for QA processes.

weeks.title: QA Documentation
weeks.description: Learn to create and maintain professional test documentation.

milestoneProject.title: QA Documentation Package
milestoneProject.description: Create a complete documentation package including test plan, organized test cases, and test summary report for a web application.

roadmap.title: SQL for Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Master SQL skills essential for extracting and analyzing business data.

weeks.title: SQL Fundamentals
weeks.description: Learn core SQL syntax for querying databases.

weeks.title: Intermediate SQL
weeks.description: Learn aggregations, grouping, and joining tables.
practiceExercises: Calculate totals and averages with GROUP BY

weeks.title: Advanced SQL for Analytics
weeks.description: Learn window functions and advanced analysis techniques.

milestoneProject.title: Business Data Analysis with SQL
milestoneProject.description: Analyze a business dataset (sales, customers, orders). Write 20+ queries including joins, aggregations, and window functions to answer business questions.

roadmap.title: Excel & Spreadsheet Mastery
roadmap.description: Develop advanced spreadsheet skills for data analysis and reporting.

weeks.title: Advanced Excel Functions
weeks.description: Master essential Excel functions for data analysis.
practiceExercises: Use VLOOKUP to combine data from sheets

weeks.title: Pivot Tables & Data Analysis
weeks.description: Master pivot tables and Excel's data analysis features.
practiceExercises: Create pivot tables from sales data

milestoneProject.title: Excel Business Dashboard
milestoneProject.description: Build an interactive Excel dashboard with pivot tables, charts, slicers, and KPI calculations for a business dataset.

roadmap.title: Data Visualization Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn principles of effective data visualization and storytelling.

weeks.title: Visualization Best Practices
weeks.description: Learn how to create clear, impactful visualizations.
subtopics: Chart Types and When to Use
practiceExercises: Choose appropriate charts for different data types
Create a data story from a dataset

milestoneProject.title: Visualization Style Guide
milestoneProject.description: Create a data visualization style guide including chart selection guidelines, color palettes, and best practices with examples.

roadmap.title: Power BI Essentials
roadmap.description: Master Microsoft Power BI for business intelligence and reporting.

weeks.title: Power BI Fundamentals
weeks.description: Get started with Power BI Desktop and data connections.

resources.name: Power BI Getting Started - Microsoft Learn
Power BI Full Course for Beginners

practiceExercises: Connect to Excel and CSV data

weeks.title: Building Power BI Reports
weeks.description: Create interactive visualizations and reports.

resources.name: Create Reports in Power BI - Microsoft Learn

weeks.title: DAX and Measures
weeks.description: Learn DAX for creating calculations and measures.

milestoneProject.title: Power BI Business Dashboard
milestoneProject.description: Build a comprehensive Power BI dashboard for business analysis. Include multiple pages, DAX measures, and interactive features.

roadmap.title: Tableau Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn Tableau for data visualization and business analytics.

weeks.title: Tableau Getting Started
weeks.description: Learn Tableau basics and create first visualizations.
practiceExercises: Create bar, line, and pie charts

weeks.title: Tableau Dashboards
weeks.description: Build interactive dashboards and stories in Tableau.

milestoneProject.title: Tableau Public Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Create and publish a professional Tableau dashboard to Tableau Public. Include multiple visualizations and interactive features.

roadmap.title: Business Requirements & Reporting
roadmap.description: Learn to gather requirements and create business reports.

weeks.title: Understanding Business Requirements
weeks.description: Learn to translate business needs into analytics solutions.
practiceExercises: Define KPIs for a business scenario

weeks.title: Report Design & Delivery
weeks.description: Create professional reports and present findings effectively.

milestoneProject.title: BI Analyst Capstone
milestoneProject.description: Complete an end-to-end BI project: gather requirements, analyze data with SQL, create visualizations in Power BI/Tableau, and present findings.

roadmap.title: Business Process Analysis
roadmap.description: Learn to analyze and document business processes for system improvements.

weeks.title: Understanding Business Processes
weeks.description: Learn fundamentals of business process analysis.
practiceExercises: Document a process you use daily

weeks.title: Process Mapping & Modeling
weeks.description: Learn to create process diagrams and flowcharts.
practiceExercises: Create a flowchart for a business process

milestoneProject.title: Process Analysis Report
milestoneProject.description: Analyze a business process, create diagrams (flowchart, swimlane), identify inefficiencies, and propose improvements.

roadmap.title: Requirements Gathering
roadmap.description: Master techniques for eliciting and documenting system requirements.

weeks.title: Requirements Elicitation
weeks.description: Learn techniques to gather requirements from stakeholders.
practiceExercises: Create interview questions for a project

weeks.title: Requirements Documentation
weeks.description: Learn to write clear, complete requirements documents.
practiceExercises: Create user stories for a feature

milestoneProject.title: Requirements Specification Document
milestoneProject.description: Create a complete requirements document for a system including functional requirements, use cases, and user stories.

roadmap.title: System Design Basics
roadmap.description: Learn fundamental concepts of system design and architecture.

weeks.title: System Architecture Overview
weeks.description: Understand basic system architecture concepts.
practiceExercises: Draw a simple system architecture diagram

weeks.title: Data Flow & System Diagrams
weeks.description: Learn to create data flow and system diagrams.
practiceExercises: Create a level 0 and level 1 DFD
Draw an ER diagram for a database
Create a sequence diagram for a feature

milestoneProject.title: System Design Document
milestoneProject.description: Create a system design document including architecture diagram, DFD, ER diagram, and component descriptions for a proposed system.

roadmap.title: Database Concepts
roadmap.description: Understand database fundamentals for systems analysis.

weeks.title: Database Fundamentals
weeks.description: Learn core database concepts and SQL basics.

weeks.title: Database Design
weeks.description: Learn database design principles for systems analysis.

milestoneProject.title: Database Design Project
milestoneProject.description: Design a complete database for a business application including ER diagram, normalized schema, and data dictionary.

roadmap.title: Project Management Basics
roadmap.description: Learn project management fundamentals relevant to systems analysis.

weeks.title: Project Management Fundamentals
weeks.description: Understand project lifecycle and management basics.

weeks.title: Agile & Scrum Basics
weeks.description: Learn Agile methodologies commonly used in IT projects.

milestoneProject.title: Project Plan Document
milestoneProject.description: Create a project plan for a system implementation including scope, WBS, timeline, and Agile user stories.

roadmap.title: Technical Documentation
roadmap.description: Master technical writing and documentation for systems analysis.

weeks.title: Technical Writing Fundamentals
weeks.description: Learn to write clear, professional technical documents.

weeks.title: Systems Documentation
weeks.description: Create professional systems analysis documents.

milestoneProject.title: Complete System Documentation
milestoneProject.description: Create a comprehensive documentation package for a system including specifications, user guide, and technical reference.

roadmap.title: Technical Communication & Stakeholder Management
roadmap.description: Develop skills to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

weeks.title: Stakeholder Communication
weeks.description: Learn to present technical information to various audiences.
practiceExercises: Present a technical concept to non-technical audience

milestoneProject.title: Systems Analyst Capstone
milestoneProject.description: Complete an end-to-end systems analysis project: analyze business processes, gather requirements, design system, create documentation, and present to stakeholders.
